alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 11:24PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT CENTRAL WEBER...EAST CENTRAL BOX ELDER...NORTHEASTERN DAVIS AND WEST CENTRAL MORGAN COUNTIES... At 1122 PM MST...A snow squall was along a line extending from near Farmington to 6 miles west of South Willard...and moving northeast at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Brigham City, Morgan, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Centerville, Woods Cross, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper and South Weber. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 317 and 367. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 105. * winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this squall. This squall produced a wind gust to 44 mph on Fremont Island at 1105 PM MST. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to produce hazardous driving conditions. Travel is not advised during this snow squall. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on to increase the visibility of your vehicle to those around you.
